spell1.name: MJOLNIR BASH
spell1.description: Wield Mjolnir to strike enemies. When Awakened, Thor can launch lightning arc waves to deal damage

spell2.name: GOD OF THUNDER
spell2.description: Soar upwards and smite the ground after charging for a duration, inflicting damage on enemies within range

attributes.label: CASTING
attributes.value: A persistent spell field that generates a one-time spell field upon expiration.

attributes.label: DAMAGE
attributes.value: While charging, create a sustained spell field that deals 40 damage every 0.5 seconds, followed by a one-time spell field that deals 220 damage.

attributes.label: RANGE
attributes.value: The sustained spell field is cylindrical, measuring 8m in radius and 20m in height, whereas the one-time spell field has an 8m spherical radius

attributes.label: CONTROL IMMUNITY
attributes.value: Immune to control effects while active

spell2.changeDescription: Team‑Ups: removed from Voltaic Union (Captain America & Storm)

spell3.name: STORM SURGE
spell3.description: Hold to spin Mjolnir before dashing forward and knocking back enemies

attributes.label: DASH DISTANCE
attributes.value: No charge: 10m; Full charge: 20m. When carrying an enemy, the ranges are 6m with no charge and 13m with full

attributes.label: DAMAGE
attributes.value: No Charge Damage: 40; Full Charge Damage: 60

spell4.name: LIGHTNING REALM
spell4.description: Summon lightning that restores Thorforce based on the number of hit enemies

attributes.label: DAMAGE
attributes.value: Deal 40 damage when enemies cross the boundaries

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: For each enemy within the spell area, 1 point of Thorforce is restored. Enemies that cross the boundary will be Slowed by 30%

spell5.name: AWAKENING RUNE
spell5.description: Consume Thorforce to enter the Awakened state, granting Bonus Health and enhancing Mjolnir Bash

attributes.label: DAMAGE
attributes.value: Projectile Damage: 70, Spell Field Damage: 30 per second

attributes.label: ATTACK INTERVAL
attributes.value: The first three stages last for 0.4s each, while the fourth stage lasts for 0.8s

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: Inflict damage over time on nearby enemies

attributes.label: MANUAL CANCEL
attributes.value: Can be cancelled after a brief delay

spell5.changeDescription: Removed shared cooldown after the Awakened state ends; Manual cancel added after a brief delay (no numeric change)

spell6.name: HAMMER THROW
spell6.description: Throw Mjolnir forward which then returns

attributes.label: CASTING
attributes.value: Launch a single-target projectile that returns after a delayed hit

attributes.label: DAMAGE
attributes.value: Outward Projectile Damage: 45; Returning Projectile Damage: 20

attributes.label: PROJECTILE SPEED
attributes.value: The projectile travels outward at a speed of 60m/s and returns at a speed of 80m/s

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT -
attributes.value: Gain 1 point of Thorforce upon hit.

spell6.changeDescription: Reworked: now standard ability with 6s cooldown, 45/20 damage, gains 1 Thorforce on hit (removed Thorforce cost & universal CD)

spell7.name: THORFORCE
spell7.description: Consume Thorforce to gain Bonus Health. Landing Mjolnir Bash on an enemy instantly recharges Thorforce

attributes.label: BONUS HEALTH PER THORFORCE
attributes.value: Each point of Thorforce consumed grants 75 Bonus Health, while abilities that consume 3 points of Thorforce grant 150 Bonus Health

attributes.label: MJOLNIR BASH ENERGY RECOVERY PER THORFORCE

spell7.changeDescription: Bonus Health reduced: 100→75 per Thorforce; max 200→150
